CustomField.formula: "Sent on: " + TEXT( MONTH(DATEVALUE( MessageDate ) )) & "/" & TEXT( DAY(DATEVALUE( MessageDate ) )) & "/" & TEXT( YEAR(DATEVALUE( MessageDate ) )) + ", " + IF( OR( VALUE( MID( TEXT( MessageDate ), 12, 2 ) ) = 0, VALUE( MID( TEXT( MessageDate ), 12, 2 ) ) = 12 ), "12", TEXT( VALUE( MID( TEXT( MessageDate ), 12, 2 ) ) - IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( MessageDate ), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, 0, 12 ) ) ) & ":" & MID( TEXT( MessageDate ), 15, 2 ) & ":" & MID( TEXT( MessageDate ), 18, 2 ) & " " & IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( MessageDate ), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, "AM", "PM" ) + ", From: " + FromName
CustomField.label: Details
